summary: This module provides a DCGMProfiler class that acts as a context manager to initialize, configure, and control a profiling session using NVIDIA's Data Center GPU Manager (DCGM). It creates GPU groups and field groups, exposes the set of available profiling fields, and manages profiling steps (start/stop) while integrating with PyTorch workloads.
business_intent: Enable developers to collect detailed GPU performance metrics during deep learning training or inference by leveraging DCGM, facilitating performance analysis, optimization, and monitoring of GPU resources.
